text: Hercules Unchained is a 1959 peplum movie starring Steve Reeves. It is a sequel to Hercules, also starring Reeves. ==References== Category:1959 adventure movies Category:Peplum movies Category:1959 fantasy movies Category:French adventure movies Category:French fantasy movies Category:Italian adventure movies Category:Italian fantasy movies Category:Spanish adventure movies Category:Spanish fantasy movies Category:Movies based on Greek and Roman mythology Category:Hercules movies Category:Movies directed by Pietro Francisci
title: Hercules Unchained
